availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sally Ann Evans McKiney in c1862. Killed by 1864.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Division 1, p. 310. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, District 2, p. 109. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Cave City, p. 9. KYR-0001-004-1326.
